author: Sorcha Pollak
title: Department announces Covid-19 self-isolation facility for asylum seekers
description: Charities call for people in HSE risk categories to be moved from ‘overcrowded’ centres
content:
An off-site self-isolation facility for asylum seekers suspected of contracting coronavirus is to be piloted as part of a range of measures to try and curb the spread in direct-provision centres.
